First Infusion.name: First Infusion
First Infusion.description:
Activate 2 Interact (Ingested)

The infusion restores a number of Hit Points equal to 1d8 times half your level (minimum 1d8) and grants a +4 circumstance bonus to the next saving throw against disease of poison attempted within 24 hours.

@Damage[(ceil((@actor.level/2),1))d8[healing]]{Leveled healing}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-specific-familiars.specific-familiars-effects.Item.6pI6nDLfhlGBUEiO]{Effect: First Infusion}

Sorcerous Sweets Candy.name: Sorcerous Sweets Candy
Sorcerous Sweets Candy.description:
Activate A Interact (Ingested)

Anyone who eats the candy as an Interact action gains a +1 item bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, and Performance checks for 1 hour. The candy maintains its enchantment until your next daily preparations.
